description:
Family, friends and fellow travellers! with great pleasure to share our home :)

Close to Empire State Building, Madison Square Garden, Macy's, Penn Station, Times Square, Restaurants, Pharmacy, Nightlife, and Macy's. Walking distance to subway station N, R, Q, F, 1, 2, 3, C, E, C and NJ transit.

Can't beat the Location, Quiet and Cozy Apartment. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

Petite Apartment with a huge dose of calmness and a stress free stay.

Private entire Studio, Bathroom, Kitchen,fridge, A/C and Queen Size bed. Complimentary coffee and tea 24hr :)

 We would like to thank all confirmed bookings for giving us a chance to open our doors and offer true service and honesty.)

Thank you for your time and we look forward to welcoming you and your family.

24/7

24/7

High Speed Internet - perfect for business travelers as well
Flat-screen TV
Cable channels
Alarm clock
Wine chiller
Rice cooker
Coffee machine
Coffee packets
Tea bags
Towels
Hair dryer
Iron and Iron board
City map
City guide
name: Broadway - Empire State - 5th Ave - Cute Apartment
review: Great location close to subway, loads of sights and things to do. The studio is perfect for one or two people. Communications with Teresita were fantastic.
